sentences.sContent: It is a commonplace to say that Northern Ireland is a backwater in modern Europe.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is a commonplace to say that Northern Ireland is a backwater in modern Europe.
sentences.sCn: 有关北爱尔兰是现代欧洲的一潭死水的说法已经是陈词滥调了。

synos.tran: [机]回水；死水；停滞不进的状态或地方

trans.tranOther: a part of a river away from the main part, where the water does not move
